alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:37AM MDT until April 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Gregory, Brule and Charles Mix Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very dry vegetation, combined with the strong winds, will also result in enhanced fire weather concerns.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
